column5: Hi there,I want to spend a couple of days of our honeymoon at a great resort. I have heard about Totem Resorts in Sioux Narrows. I need to hear from anyone who has been there. Which of the resorts is best, we want great food, some r&r, a little solitude, suntanning and do little fishing also.I appreciate any suggestions on where to stay, what to ask for . Thanks a bunch.
